name: 8th International Conference on Advanced Research in Social Sciences
content: The 8th International Conference on Advanced Research in Social Sciences (ICARSS) invites members of academia, scholars, and researchers to Oxford – the United Kingdom on 27 – 29 of March 2025\. Join social sciences conference as we explore the latest trends in the field of social sciences and discuss common challenges in the areas of politics, law, education, humanities, culture studies, society, and sociology. Immerse yourself in the pool of knowledge and share your research findings with the international network.
